features: 【Travel Sensory Toys For Toddlers 1-3】Montessori toys for 1 year old boy is designed in the shape of a crab to stimulate your baby's curiosity and imagination. Montessori toys for babies 6-12 months has rich and bright colors, cute crab appearance, so your kids can't put it down! Baby & toddler toys for 2 year old boys hook on the bottom can not only pull down, make sounds and the crab's eyes wiggle and attract the baby's attention, but also easy to hang.

【Baby Toys 6 to 12 Months-Build Fine Motor Skills】Rich and bright color matching can promote the baby's cognition of color, attract the baby's attention. *2 year old girls toys has 3 slidable buttons of different colors and 3 holes, gently press any button and slide the button from one hole to another hole.*The rope that pulls from side to side promotes the development of your baby's hand eye coordination ability.*The bottom strips can be rotated, which can exercise the baby's finger strength.

【6 Month Old Baby Toys -Easy To Carry】Hanging car seat stroller plane pull string toy that will keep your baby entertained during car rides, walks,airplane and other adventures.Toddler travel toys, educational toys, toddler toys for airplane travel. 1 year old boys toys is sized for easy to take along, making it the perfect playmate for your child on the go.

【100% Safe Material】Infant toys 6-12 months made with high quality and ABS,100% safe material, Non-toxic, BPA and phthalate free. Easy to clean. The high quality grade toys can relieve the discomfort of the baby during teething, soothe the baby's emotions, and let the baby chew with confidence.

【Gifts for One Year Old Boys Girls kids】1 year old boy birthday gift for travel car essential will bring your lovely babies more happiness, strengthen the bond between parents and babies, designed to make children smarter, more imaginative and creative, decrease anxiety for autistic children.It would be the perfect gifts for 18 month old toys as Birthday gifts,Christmas gifts, Children's Day gifts, New Year gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for my son and nephew. Both love these! It comes with 2. I attach a pacifier clip to my sons Walker so he can’t lose/drop it. The push buttons move around and keep a little one busy!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great entertaining toy
reviews.reviewText: Great entertaining toy for baby! Also teaches fine motor skills

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for motor skills
reviews.reviewText: This is such a small, inexpensive toy, but is so worth buying. It has many different parts on it that babies can play around with to help develop their motor skills. They can pull, slide and turn many parts on this toy. It’s BPA free and most of it is made of soft materials, so I don’t mind my baby chewing on it. It’s colorful and can hang easily if you have some kind of clip to put it on your car seat or stroller. This will also make an awesome gift to put in a basket for someone’s baby shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crab Montessori Toy-Both Engaging and Calming
reviews.reviewText: The crab Montessori toy has become an essential companion for me during moments of boredom. The set includes two crab toys, providing double the fidgeting fun!First and foremost, the color scheme of the crab toys is simply fantastic. As someone who adores green and blue, I was delighted to see these vibrant colors incorporated into the design.The combination of these hues adds a playful and cheerful element to the toy, making it visually appealing and captivating.The packaging of the crab Montessori toy set was also impressive. Both toys arrived neatly packaged, ensuring they were protected during transit. This attention to detail showcases the care and thoughtfulness of the manufacturer in delivering a high-quality product.When it comes to functionality, these crab toys have become my go-to solution for combating boredom. Whether I'm in need of a mental break or seeking a calming activity, I find myself instinctively reaching for these fidget toys.The tactile experience they offer, with their various textures and movable parts, provides a soothing sensation that helps me relax and refocus my mind.Beyond their calming effects, the crab Montessori toys also serve as a useful tool for promoting fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.The small knobs, buttons, and gears on the crabs engage my fingers and encourage dexterity. It's a wonderful way to keep my hands busy while simultaneously improving my motor skills.I appreciate the versatility of these toys. They can be used in various settings, whether at home, in the office, or while traveling.Their compact size and lightweight nature make them portable and convenient to carry around, ensuring I always have an engaging activity at my fingertips.The crab Montessori toy set has exceeded my expectations as a fidget toy. The delightful color scheme, thoughtful packaging, and engaging design make it a standout choice.Whether you're looking to alleviate boredom, improve fine motor skills, or simply enjoy a calming sensory experience, these crab toys are a fantastic addition to your collection.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great car seat occupying toy
reviews.reviewText: This is used for my 10 month old granddaughter to occupy her in her car seat. He likes pulling on the arms and I was surprised how quickly she figured out how to push the little button around on the inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Two great toys for the price of one
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know if these toys are actually used in Montessori nurseries/daycares, or used Montessori theory in their product development and design (Montessori is not a trademark, but an educational method developed by Maria Montessori in Italy over 100 years ago) but it doesn’t matter as these are fantastic.For something that realistically will only be useful for 6 months or so, the quality is superb - silicone and plastic. Easy to clean. The pull strings and other movable parts move easily. I myself enjoyed playing around with it before washing it thoroughly to hand over to our granddaughter who’s staying for the evening.So far she loves it - at four months old she doesn’t quite get what to do with it (yet) but it keeps her busy and that is a win right there.I can’t stress enough how great it is that you get two of these. Babies are fickle and can latch onto a favourite toy quite quickly. If one of these winds up getting dirty, falls on the floor and the dog runs away with it, whatever — we have a back up on the ready to swap out whilst we clean the other.Highly recommend, cannot find a single fault with this and I’m a tough critic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: A fantastic sensory toy for children
reviews.reviewText: For individuals experiencing difficulties in sensory processing, the Sensor toy is truly worthwhile. Special education teacher, my student saw the benefits of this approach. The sensor toy is one such toy that effectively integrates all these senses, thus proving extremely useful for the therapeutic exercise of sensory integration. Customization is available for it, and hence you allow your children to play with the kind of setting they like. This toy comes with inbuilt sounds that make their game interesting and help regulate sensory systems such as sensory input or sensory calmness and soothing experience experienced might need. I have noted that kids get more engrossed with concentrating on self-regulating their sensory stimuli through the use of this toy. The material has also been amazing in our classroom sensory corner.Despite frequent usage and handling, the toy’s durability is admirable. This is quite important, especially in an educational setting since the materials used are child-friendly and can easily be cleaned.The Sensor Toy is an excellent resource for sensory therapy and educational environments. It is necessary for kids with sensory challenges because of its durable build and flexibility.

reviews.reviewText: This little toy is so interesting. It looks a bit like a crab and has several points of interest. Bright and colourful with things to pull and twist and just hold. It will attach to a cot or pram or high chair with no pieces that will come loose and all pieces are quite large so safe for play.
